TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Minister of Relations, 01-12-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Minister of Relations, January 12, 1829. Forwarding a copy of the memorial already mailed on September 8. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 158
